sentences.en: Articulating the scripts of living and working as both separate and interdependent.
sentences.cn: 工作与生活的空间,既是分离的,又是互相依存的.
经济上相互依赖的国家

sentences.en: How do you get 3,000 interdependent creatures into a cage, alive?
sentences.cn: 你要怎么做,才能把3,000个互相依存的生物塞到笼子里去 —— 还得是活着的?

sentences.en: In physics it is better to think of interdependent quantities.
sentences.cn: 在物理学上,较常考虑相互依赖的量.

sentences.en: Interdependence theory presents logical analysis of the interdependent relationship between s individuals.
sentences.cn: 人际互倚理论主要关注群体中个体之间的相互依附关系.

sentences.en: It is interdependent between the development of capital market and commercial banks.
sentences.cn: 资本市场与商业银行的发展存在着相互依存、相互制约的关系.

sentences.en: Mutual and all sorts of environmental element interaction, interdependent, associated.
sentences.cn: 各种环境因素相互作用 、 相互依赖 、 相互关联.

sentences.en: Peace, development and environmental protection are interdependent and indivisible.
sentences.cn: 和平 、 发展与环境保护三者是互相依存,不可分割的.

sentences.en: Scientists and the public are realising that all life is deeply interdependent.
sentences.cn: 科学家和公众逐渐意识到,一切生命都是高度相互依存的.

sentences.en: The endogenous hormonal ratio was interdependent to the microspore abortion of radish.
sentences.cn: 可见,萝卜小孢子的败育与内源激素平衡的破坏有关.

sentences.en: The new model is global in scale , an interdependent network.
sentences.cn: 新的商业方式是全球性 、 互依存的网络系统.

sentences.en: The three an interdependent triangle and add up to understanding.
sentences.cn: 这三点是来自相互连系相互依托的理解三角.

sentences.en: The various branches of the national economy are interrelated and interdependent.
sentences.cn: 国民经济各部门是互相关联互相依存的.

sentences.en: The world is becoming increasingly interdependent.
sentences.cn: 世界正变得越来越需要相互依存。

sentences.en: Then it expounds the interdependent relation between theoretical and empirical research.
sentences.cn: 在此基础上阐述了实证研究与思辨研究的关系,主张二者的关系不是指导与被指导,而是相互依赖,相互促进关系.

sentences.en: This shows that two science departments are interdependent and influent each other.
sentences.cn: 这说明,这两个科学部门是相互依赖、互影响的.

trans.tran_cn: 互相依赖的，互相依存的
trans.tran_en: depending on or necessary to each other
